examples.translation: As long as I've heard, Caner's birthday party is tomorrow.

examples.text: Yarın sabah beş parti portakal gelecek.
examples.translation: Five shipments of oranges will come tomorrow morning.

glosses: lot (some items auctioned or sold as a unit)

examples.text: Postaneden üç parti pul satın aldık.
examples.translation: We bought three lots of stamps from the post office.

examples.text: Yeşil parti oyların yüzde on beşini aldı.
examples.translation: The green party took 15 percent of the votes.
